The right: wing blog Breitbart.com published a headline suggesting Abrams had admitted that her plans may require Georgians to turn their guns in.
During a November 4 appearance on CNN: s State of the Union, Abrams admitted that a possible outcome of her gun control plans could be that people would turn their guns in, but she also mentioned other options such as buybacks and grandfathering in certain firearms.
